title: 10 Simple Actions That Unf*ck Your Life
description:
We tend to overestimate how much we need to do to change our lives around. We assume that there must be some epic transcendent moment, when in reality, change is just a series of small behaviors done repeatedly for a long time. 

I flew out and met a fan recently to put this principle into action. Here are our shenanigans. If you want to appear in a video like this, you can apply here: https://mrk.mn/youtube
